tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr. Mohan about 20 years back for the first time.  I had an appointment with him on April 13 and he recognised me after so long.  He is very senior and well known in his field; at the same time very friendly with patients.  My family members are also treated by him.  One can have full confidence getting treated by Dr. Mohan.  

Many of us in pursuit of achieving the best in profession or biz do not pay much attention to our teeth.  We must realise that a good set of teeth not only gives good physical appearance but will also boost self confidence.
reply_text: Thanks for patronising us. We are indebted to u all

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great doctor no pain during the procedure! Very friendly staff and overall just a great experience as always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
Very experienced doctor. Doctor whom you can trust blindly..Precision is the word.No other dentist will give you.
I had wisdom tooth which had damaged the molar tooth and  other dentist only said that tooth extraction is solution and rct will not last for 6 months ..but Dr Mohan proved them wrong..He saved my molar tooth by doing RCT and saved my tooth..I have not seen any doctor passionate as Dr Mohan..Technicians are good as well..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Mohan explains to you the whole procedure of treatment with an honest opinion, all in a very friendly way. Mine was 6 implants with tooth extractions which he finished without any discomfort to me. Took utmost care during surgery and hence it was very stress free. His staff are well trained, polite & very kind. My trust in Dr. Mohanâ€™s  ability to deliver with precision is what made me go to him.  Very professional & kind.  Thank you Doctor & your team.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
context: Acrylic Partial Denture,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
I met him through a friendâ€™s recommendation for my mother . 
He was friendly with me but not with my mother who is 70 years and naturally anxious by nature.
** ****** ** ************* ** giving her upper denture much bigger to her jaw size. My mum explicitly told him she wants small teeth but be kept on saying big can be changed to small not otherwise. 
He fixed the lower bridges and caps of my mum permanently again big in size without giving setting trial and while the upper denture were still a problem. 
He only like to talk big and boost about his cooking skills and his 43 years experience in dentistry. 
Expensive treatment and zero patient comfort . 
Donâ€™t listen to his polished talking ** ** ********* ** ***** ** ***** *** ***** 
He extracted my mothers tooth leaving a pic inside which was caught later in her scan.
My mum lost 9 kgs 
He took 3 months for giving my mother good dentures and ultimately we had to leave him half way. *** ****** ** ** ******* *** **** *** ** **** 
Overall I regret trusting him. 
Would say think twice.
